special_text:
If damage would be dealt to Mireio while you control a creature with a cage counter on it, that damage is dealt to a permanent you control with a cage counter on it instead.
[+1]: You may sacrifice a creature. If you do, draw two cards. If you don’t, put a cage counter on a creature you control.
[-3]: Create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens with decayed. [i](It can’t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)[/i]
